preference.name: PS2_Log_Mask
preference.preference_description:
Defines what output to log:
1 = Error 2 = Warning 3 = Info 4 = Debug

preference.name: PS2_Log_Streams
preference.preference_description:
Defines where to log to:
1 = Standard error stream 2 = Standard output stream 3 = Teamcenter syslog

preference.name: PS2_Naming_Rules
preference.preference_description:
Definition for all naming rules.
Format is:<object_type>:<property_type>:<property_name>:<reg_ex>:<max_length>:<error_message>

context.name: Teamcenter
context.value: BOMLine:string:bl_ref_designator:^[0-9]+$:20:Reference Designator must only contain numbers and have a maximum length of 20 characters.

preference.name: PS2_Referencer_Properties
preference.preference_description:
Definition for all referencer runtime properties.
Format is:<source_type>:<source_property>:<relation_type>:<type_filder[;<type_filter>...]
